1370: Syuardus moved to Kerckstraet.C.0 after marriage.
Got married to Sybillia at age 20 in 1370.
Had a son with Sybillia, Rolant, at age 20.
1372: Had a son with Sybillia, Sanders, at age 22.
1373: Had a son with Sybillia, Walic, at age 23.
1374: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Reynildis, at age 24.
1375: Had a daughter with Sybillia, Linnea, at age 25.
Lost daughter Reynildis when Reynildis was 2 years old.
1376: Had a son with Sybillia, Ramont, at age 26.
Lost son Walic when Walic was 4 years old.
1377: Lost his wife Sybillia while she was giving birth to Elyasа in 1377.
Became caretaker of Rolant, Sanders, Linnea, Ramont, Elyasа at age 28.
1378: Lost son Ramont when Ramont was 3 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
